title: Get Help from Auntie Ethel
content:
lsewhere. Leave.

Choosing dialogue 1 will not get Auntie Ethel to reveal why she chose this as her payment., you can pick from the list of dialogue options again. Choosing dialogue 3 will gain the disapproval of Lae'zel, but this will make Auntie Ethel very happy, and changes into her hag form. This will give you the following dialogue options.

So the brothers were right. You are a hag. What in the hells are you? Cute. Am I supposed to be impressed? Give me one reason why I shouldn't cut you d
